snippet: The companies said the deal would create the world’s largest publicly traded nitrogen company as CF Industries acquires several divisions from the Dutch firm.
abstract: DealBook Online; fertilizer maker CF Industries will acquire European and North American operations and global distribution business from OCI of the Netherlands for $8 billion, including debt; deal could create world's largest public nitrogen company.
lead_paragraph: The companies said the deal would create the world’s largest publicly traded nitrogen company as CF Industries acquires several divisions from the Dutch firm.

headline.main: CF Industries to Acquire Businesses From OCI for $8 Billion
